description:
Watching a kissing scene in TV while cooking for his mother`s restaurant (and destroying the frying pan in the process), watching a cute girl while driving back on his scooter with the freshly purchased replacement pan - only to awake in hospital... you can say this just wasn`t Makoto`s day: His hand-held is broken and his girls` database is gone as well.
In the hospital Makoto gets interested in the cute nurse apprentice Mizuki and starts to hit on her, with the help of a young girl named Lisa-chan, a patient like himself who knows the nurse quite well already. But the present he gives to Mizuki backfires completely.

titles.title: A Smile to the Tearful Angel: Memorial Essence
Namida no Tenshi ni Hohoemi o
Redonner le sourire à un ange
Un sorriso per l`angelo in lacrime.
